name: Connect not Crash
description:
This is a prototype created for TOJAM 2020. This is a UNITY created game.

note: Win condition is not set, but Game Over is when you collide the two trains. plus some bugs left over. Might be fixed if there is interest and time.

1. you must connect both tracks by selecting the train and select the track you want to lay. 

2. train A cannot use the tracks of train B

3. restart the game to try a new configuration
